    • Field Detail

      • backingCache

        protected final LoaderCache<VolatileGlobalCellCache.Key,Cell<?>> backingCache

    • Constructor Detail

      • VolatileGlobalCellCache

        public VolatileGlobalCellCache(int maxNumLevels,
                               int numFetcherThreads)
        Create a new global cache with a new fetch queue served by the specified number of fetcher threads.
        Parameters:
        maxNumLevels - the highest occurring mipmap level plus 1.
        numFetcherThreads - how many threads should be created to load data.

      • VolatileGlobalCellCache

        public VolatileGlobalCellCache(BlockingFetchQueues<Callable<?>> queue)
        Create a new global cache with the specified fetch queue. (It is the callers responsibility to create fetcher threads that serve the queue.)
        Parameters:
        queue - queue to which asynchronous data loading jobs are submitted

    • Method Detail

      • prepareNextFrame

        public void prepareNextFrame()
        Prepare the cache for providing data for the "next frame", by moving pending cell request to the prefetch queue (BlockingFetchQueues.clearToPrefetch()).
        Specified by:
        prepareNextFrame in interface CacheControl

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Remove all references to loaded data as well as all enqueued requests from the cache.
